metadata.title: CVE-2024-9398 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: By checking the result of calls to `window.open` with specifically setprotocol handlers, an attacker could determine if the application whichimplements that protocol handler is installed. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 131, Firefox ESR < 128.3, Thunderbird < 128.3, and Thunderbird <131.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
